structure.unit: COUNTY ROAD ENGINEER AND MAINTENANCE OF PUBLIC ROADS

law.history: Repealed 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 19, effective June 17, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4356d.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Engineer to bring actions for county.
